SCTX:
begin gateSound

float ranVar
float timer
short randomized

if ( randomized == 0 )
	set ranVar to Random, 6
	set randomized to 1
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "MS_BattleBots2" >= 1 )

set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed

	if ( timer >= ranVar )
		PlaySound "shock bolt"
		set timer to 0
		set randomized to 0
	endif
endif

end
